mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.HR_NAME as lastname from operate_log t1 left join AD_EMPLOYEE_V t2 on t1.user_id = t2.HR_NO ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select count(*) VISIT_TIMES from OPERATE_LOG OL LEFT JOIN AD_EMPLOYEE_V AEV ON OL.USER_ID = AEV.HR_NO where OL.OPERATE_TYPE in (0,3) AND TO_CHAR(OL.OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm') = #{month} AND AEV.DEPARTID in ( select distinct(departid) from ad_depart_v Start with departid=#{site} Connect by prior depart_code=PARENTCODE)

select count(*) NOTE_NUMBER from OPERATE_LOG OL LEFT JOIN AD_EMPLOYEE_V AEV ON OL.USER_ID = AEV.HR_NO where OL.OPERATE_TYPE in (2) AND TO_CHAR(OL.OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm') = #{month} AND AEV.DEPARTID in ( select distinct(departid) from ad_depart_v Start with departid=#{site} Connect by prior depart_code=PARENTCODE)

select totalnumber,depart_name from ( select count(*) totalnumber,aev.departid,adv.depart_name from OPERATE_LOG ol left join AD_EMPLOYEE_V aev on ol.user_id = aev.hr_no left join AD_DEPART_V adv on aev.departid = adv.departid where ol.operate_type = '2' and TO_CHAR(OL.OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm') = #{month} and aev.departid is not null and aev.departid in (select distinct(departid) from ad_depart_v Start with departid=#{site} Connect by prior depart_code=PARENTCODE) group by aev.departid,aev.departid,adv.depart_name order by totalnumber desc) where rownum <9
